ComicInfo.Summary: True Confessions: Sara and Patrick interrogate the thug who killed Molly's granddaughter and Sara uses the Witchblade to force him to make a full confession. Sara and Patrick meet at a Chinese restaurant for an official date but their good time is ruined when Ian Nottingham comes crashing through the restaurant's front window.
